Module edu.guilford
Package edu.guilford

Class MeatEater

java.lang.Object
edu.guilford.Creature
edu.guilford.Critter
edu.guilford.MeatEater
public class MeatEater extends Critter
A class that represents a meat eater object in the simulation

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class edu.guilford.Critter

    canBreathe, canDrink, foodEaten

    Fields inherited from class edu.guilford.Creature

    age, alive, rate, size

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MeatEater(float size, float rate, float foodNeed, PlantEater[] plantEaters)
    A constructor that initializes a meat eater object with a size, growth rate, and amount of food needed; foodEaten will be set to zero

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    eat()
    A method that simulates the meat eater object eating; it chases a random number of plant eater objects and eats them
    void
    setPlantEaters(PlantEater[] plantEaters)
    A method that sets the plant eater array of the meat eater object
    void
    setSize(float size)
    A setter that sets the size of the meat eater object
    void
    simulateDay()
    A method that simulates a day in the life of the meat eater object; it first calls the eat method, then the simulateDay method of the Critter class, and finally the simulateDay method of the Creature class

    Methods inherited from class edu.guilford.Critter

    eat, getFoodNeed, setCanBreathe, setCanDrink, setFoodNeed, stillNeed

    Methods inherited from class edu.guilford.Creature

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • MeatEater

      public MeatEater(float size, float rate, float foodNeed, PlantEater[] plantEaters)
      A constructor that initializes a meat eater object with a size, growth rate, and amount of food needed; foodEaten will be set to zero
      Parameters:
      size - the initial size of the object (in g)
      rate - the initial rate of growth of the object (in g/day)
      foodNeed - the amount of food the object needs each day (in g)

  • Method Details

    • simulateDay

      public void simulateDay()
      A method that simulates a day in the life of the meat eater object; it first calls the eat method, then the simulateDay method of the Critter class, and finally the simulateDay method of the Creature class
      Overrides:
      simulateDay in class Critter

    • eat

      public void eat()
      A method that simulates the meat eater object eating; it chases a random number of plant eater objects and eats them

    • setPlantEaters

      public void setPlantEaters(PlantEater[] plantEaters)
      A method that sets the plant eater array of the meat eater object
      Parameters:
      plantEaters - the array of plant eater objects that the meat eater object can chase and eat

    • setSize

      public void setSize(float size)
      A setter that sets the size of the meat eater object
      Parameters:
      size - the new size of the meat eater object (in g)
